solution_line_template: With the bakery stop, Kona drove a total of {apt_to_bakery} + {bakery_to_grandma} + {grandma_to_apt} = <<{apt_to_bakery}+{bakery_to_grandma}+{grandma_to_apt}={total_with_bakery}>>{total_with_bakery} miles.
Without the bakery stop, Kona drove a total of {grandma_to_apt} + {grandma_to_apt} = <<{grandma_to_apt}+{grandma_to_apt}={total_without_bakery}>>{total_without_bakery} miles.
With the bakery stop, Kona drives an additional {total_with_bakery} - {total_without_bakery} = <<{total_with_bakery}-{total_without_bakery}={additional_miles}>>{additional_miles} miles.
